 3 months ago 
 by  theconcordian 
 Do you want to work for student press? We're at the   #communityfair   on the 7th floor of the Hall building until 4pm today! Come check out our table and learn all about how you can write for us. We'd love to see you there! 
 2 months ago 
 by  theconcordian 
 Sneak peak! We'll be bringing you all the latest and greatest in film reviews in our next issue! Stay tuned!   #TiffatTIFF   
 2 months ago 
 by  theconcordian 
 Thanks to everyone who came to our radio workshop, hosted by our own   @alexcole39   and   @cjlo1690am  's Allison! If you couldn't make it, stay tuned for our video coverage. We hope to see you at our next workshop! 
 1 month ago 
 by  theconcordian 
 Last week, some of our staff took a tour Hebdo Litho, where copies of The Concordian are printed.   #FunFact  : one of those rolls of paper is enough to print 3 weeks worth of our paper. That's 12,000 copies of The Concordian! : Maggie Hope & Mackenzie Lad 
 4 weeks ago 
 by  theconcordian 
 Our arts editor interviewed Tranna Wintour, the new MC of this year's   #rockyhorror   event happening at Cinema Imperial this weekend! Stay tuned for our coverage in our next issue! : Maggie Hope and Alex Hutchins
